content: वृंदारक {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (का|रिका|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) {@--1@} Much, great, many. {@--2@} Eminent, best, excellent. {@--3@} Pleasing, attractive, handsome, lovely. {@--4@} Respectable, venerable. --कः {@--1@} A god, deity; प्रितो वृंदारण्यं नतनिखिलवृंदारकवृतः <ls>Bv. 4. 5.</ls> {@--2@} The chief of anything (at the end of <ab>comp.</ab>); see (2) above.
